summary: As Louis mainly spent Christmas morning with Harry, do you think Harry prepared a twinning green plaid PJs written on them...
body:
As Louis mainly spent Christmas morning with Harry, do you think Harry prepared a twinning green plaid PJs written on them “Treat people with kindness & Louis’ logo Smiley face ” for him & Louis ?

✉ fan artists : “Would u please draw Larry wearing these PJs at Christmas morning”

summary:
So, I’ll just try this out. This is my first one shot, EVER. If it worked out fine then great. & I’ll write some more.
Y/N is...
body:
Moved on?

So, I’ll just try this out. This is my first one shot, EVER. If it worked out fine then great. & I’ll write some more.

Y/N is the host for their Movie Marathon and some things needed to be addressed and let out.

  • 2k words
  • ANGST!
  • I want to cry.

And this time, y/n will turn her apartment into a movie theater that’ll cater up to 8 people. Well, 9. Harry’s fling wanted to join the movie marathon, and y/n is infuriated.

Why couldn’t he message y/n before hand that he will bring someone in their movie marathon? What is his point? Just because they broke up two weeks ago, he wanted to make y/n jealous?

The clock striked 6pm. One by one of their friends would arrive and y/n would answer the door.

“Oh! Come on in. There are wine and cheese platter in the kitchen. There are beers inside the fridge and snacks in the cupboard. Just help yourself.” y/n called out to their friends as she answered the door.

Before she could face the person who she opened the door for, she was enveloped into a hug and the familiar scent made her head dizzy. “Hello. I missed you.” Harry said to her. Y/n hummed and untangled herself from the hug.

Harry was smiling. Like really smiling. His dimples were out and about. Standing beside him was a beautiful and petite girl. And y/n didn’t realize that she was staring at her and their entwined hands. When Harry saw on what she was staring, he cleared his throat and that made y/n come back to her senses, “Fuck. I’m so rude for staring. I’m y/n, Harry’s e- I mean, friend.” She said smiling at her and brought her hand forward awaiting Harry’s companion to introduce herself, “That’s okay. I’m Nadine.” The girl replied and shook her hand.

She smiled and stepped to the side to let them in.

All smile and eyes twinkling was the thing that you can see on y/n, but inside, she was screaming her head off and breaking into pieces.

When everyone was complete and is already situated in her living room, y/n took the popcorn and mozzarella sticks to the living room to get the movie marathon started.

“Kent? Will you do the honors to present me the genre bowl for tonight? So we would know what genre of movie that we’re going to watch.” Their friend Kent stood up and took the glass bowl filled with folded papers that contained movie genres of all sorts and stood beside y/n. “Here. Take one.” Y/n took a piece of paper and unfolded it. As she was unfolding it, she saw Harry and Nadine all cuddled up on the sofa and not paying attention to what’s happening in front of them.

“Oh, fuck. Great! It’s Horror. Can I choose something else?” Y/n sighed. She’s not a fan of horror movies at ALL. One time, when they had chosen Horror as the genre of film that they’ll be watching in their friend Leah’s apartment, y/n forced everyone to sleep in one bedroom with all the lights on. She was THAT terrified.

That’s why she was unsure of this genre that she had picked. “Nope! We’ve been watching Comedy and Romance way too long. Like four movie marathons in a row. Horror is a breathe of fresh air.” Kent said as y/n’s shoulder slumped with his statement. “Let’s just get on with it, I guess.” Y/n replied, still sad and truly horrified on what’s about to happen in tonight’s movie marathon.

Y/n went to her iPad and connected to the Apple TV so that they can watch it on Netflix. Y/n didn’t know this kind of stuff. Harry gave the Apple TV as a present, and she hadn’t used it only if needed to.

Leah saw that she was struggling connecting the iPad to the Apple TV, so she threw a pillow in Harry’s direction. Which he was still flirting with Nadine. “Oi, mate! Help y/n with the setup and stop sucking each other’s faces. Jeez!” Harry rolled his eyes at Leah and mocked her. He untangled himself from Nadine and kissed her temple as he stood up to help y/n.

Y/n handed her iPad to Harry, and he took it. Within 2 minutes, the iPad was already connected, and Harry gave it back to y/n.

Y/n thanked Harry, and he smiled back at her. Y/n turned around from them and made a gagging gesture.

Y/n picked “The Nun” and sat down beside the two love birds. She just rolled her eyes and munch on the popcorn as she was intently watching the movie and trying not to flinch or scream that much because there is no one there to hold her. She felt a tap on her shoulder, and that made her scream out loud and made a mess from her popcorn bowl.

“Oh my god! I’m so sorry, Y/N. I just wanted to ask you if are there any more beers in the fridge? Nadine wanted some.” Harry said hurriedly. Y/n was clutching her chest at the moment and heaving out loud. “You fucker! You could’ve called me and not tap my shoulder. And to answer your question, no. There aren’t any more beers in the fridge. I only bought eight cans.” Y/N hit Harry’s arm and diverted her gaze back to the movie.

Harry snickered and slumped back to the couch, “Here, baby. Just drink mine. I’ll just go get some water for us.” He said while holding his beer out to Nadine. He stood up and shrugged out the popcorn kernels from his jeans and went to the kitchen.

Y/n just rolled her eyes again. “Who the fuck does he think he is? Making me jealous and calling her fling ‘baby’? All he ever called ‘baby’ was me! Okay, I know we broke up, but that was his type of endearment to me!” Having a monologue inside her brain. Y/N had a frown etched on her face while watching the movie. Not that interested and scared anymore with the movie ever since Harry called Nadine “baby.”

Harry came back with two bottles of water in hand and gave the other one to Nadine. “Thanks, bub.” Nadine cooed at Harry and kissed his cheeks. And y/n still had a frown on her face.

As the movie progresses, y/n was already bored of it and not interested in it. Since she knew that Taissa Farmiga was in the movie because apparently, Taissa was too pretty and cute for Y/N that’s why she wasn’t terrified anymore.

She was playing a game on her phone when she felt someone kicking her sides. When she glanced beside her, Nadine was already laying down the sofa, and her head was on Harry’s lap.

Y/n groaned and brushed off Nadine’s leg which caught their attention. Y/n just looked at them and raised her eyebrows. Gesturing at Nadine’s feet nudging her. Nadine smiled and said a soft “sorry” to her. Y/n nodded and returned playing on her phone.

After a few minutes while she was already in Level 168 of Happy Glass when she lost grip on her phone due to someone’s foot colliding with her phone screen.

She stood up and paused the movie. Earning a few groans from their friends. She flicked on the light switch of her living room only to see Harry and Nadine full on snogging.

Y/n’s eyes went wide with what she saw and heard a few gasps behind her. She saw Nadine’s water bottle on the table, she opened it and threw the contents of the bottle to them.

“WHAT THE FUCK!” Harry yelled, abruptly standing up which resulted to Nadine falling off the couch. “OW! HARRY!” Nadine moaned while clutching her arm. “Oh, fuck! I’m so sorry, baby.” Harry immediately rushed to her side and helped her sat down the sofa.

And that statement, made y/n lose her mind. “BABY? Are you fucking kidding me?” Y/n yelled at the top of her lungs. Making everyone go silent. Only y/n’s breathing will be heard. Harry and Nadine looked small in y/n’s gaze. Only if looks could kill, they’d be dead for sure.

Leah ran to y/n’s side and rubbed her back and whispered, “Calm down, y/n. You’re better than this. Don’t do it.” That made y/n tear up. A tear after another and another fell down y/n’s cheeks.

“First, I didn’t complained to you when you said you were going to have a plus one in this movie marathon and you didn’t informed me in advance. Second, you weren’t paying attention to the movie and to me while I was infront. And thirdly, I am deeply hurt. You’re already moved on even tho we’ve only broken up 2 weeks ago.” After that outburst, y/n ran to her room and locked herself there.

Knock and screams is the only thing that is consuming the apartment. Apart from blaming Harry to all of this. She can hear their friends going to the other room to sleep or to just talk to each other of what just happened to y/n.

Y/n was laying on her bed facing the wall and she heard a click on her door knob and a silhouette came in view from her wall. “Go away. I don’t fucking need you here. Who ever you are. Go away.” Y/n warned while sniffling.

“I only brought Nadine just so I can get a reaction from you.” Harry said. That voice. That voice that made y/n’s heart shatter, happy and all sorts of emotions.

Y/n remained still in her position. “Well, that’s a shitty move. Also, I don’t know what I would feel if I was a bait of my fling just to get back to her ex.” Harry chuckled with that and y/n just rolled her eyes.

Y/n has a habit to roll her eyes. Like every situation ever. “I can sense that you’re rolling your eyes at me. Also, who says about getting back together?” Y/n’s eyes widened at that. In fact, no one really said about getting back together. All he said was to get a reaction from her.

Y/n hoped that Harry can’t see her cheeks in a deep shade of red because of embarrassment. Good thing that the room is dark enough.

She sat up and faced him. She sniffed her nose and coughed up. Harry slowly made his way to her bed and sat down, “I’m sorry, y/n. That was so immature of me. I still love you. I never stopped loving you, y/n.”

She really didn’t know what to say with that. She fiddled with her fingers and heaved up. “I don’t know what to say, Harry. I’ve been so emotionally unstable ever since my Aunt died last month and especially last 2 weeks ago when we broke up. I still love you too. But I don’t know if I want us to be together again. I think we’re better off as friends.” As y/n finished her statement, Harry was already at her door and about to exit her room. “I won’t give up on you, y/n. I’ll show you that what we had is still worth fighting for.”

As Harry finished and exited her room, y/n sighed and slumped back on her bed staring at the ceiling. Not even realizing the single tear that fell from her eye. She closed her eyes and muttered, “I don’t want you to give up.”

And maybe y/n slept a little better that night since she released all those pent up emotions inside of her.

—

FUCKKKKKKKKKK.

And that statement, made y/n lose her mind. “BABY? Are you fucking kidding me?” Y/n yelled at the top of her lungs. Making everyone go silent. Only y/n’s breathing will be heard. Harry and Nadine looked small in y/n’s gaze. Only if looks could kill, they’d be dead for sure.

Leah ran to y/n’s side and rubbed her back and whispered, “Calm down, y/n. You’re better than this. Don’t do it.” That made y/n tear up. A tear after another and another fell down y/n’s cheeks.

“First, I didn’t complained to you when you said you were going to have a plus one in this movie marathon and you didn’t informed me in advance. Second, you weren’t paying attention to the movie and to me while I was infront. And thirdly, I am deeply hurt. You’re already moved on even tho we’ve only broken up 2 weeks ago.” After that outburst, y/n ran to her room and locked herself there.

Knock and screams is the only thing that is consuming the apartment. Apart from blaming Harry to all of this. She can hear their friends going to the other room to sleep or to just talk to each other of what just happened to y/n.

Y/n was laying on her bed facing the wall and she heard a click on her door knob and a silhouette came in view from her wall. “Go away. I don’t fucking need you here. Who ever you are. Go away.” Y/n warned while sniffling.

“I only brought Nadine just so I can get a reaction from you.” Harry said. That voice. That voice that made y/n’s heart shatter, happy and all sorts of emotions.

Y/n remained still in her position. “Well, that’s a shitty move. Also, I don’t know what I would feel if I was a bait of my fling just to get back to her ex.” Harry chuckled with that and y/n just rolled her eyes.

Y/n has a habit to roll her eyes. Like every situation ever. “I can sense that you’re rolling your eyes at me. Also, who says about getting back together?” Y/n’s eyes widened at that. In fact, no one really said about getting back together. All he said was to get a reaction from her.

Y/n hoped that Harry can’t see her cheeks in a deep shade of red because of embarrassment. Good thing that the room is dark enough.

She sat up and faced him. She sniffed her nose and coughed up. Harry slowly made his way to her bed and sat down, “I’m sorry, y/n. That was so immature of me. I still love you. I never stopped loving you, y/n.”

She really didn’t know what to say with that. She fiddled with her fingers and heaved up. “I don’t know what to say, Harry. I’ve been so emotionally unstable ever since my Aunt died last month and especially last 2 weeks ago when we broke up. I still love you too. But I don’t know if I want us to be together again. I think we’re better off as friends.” As y/n finished her statement, Harry was already at her door and about to exit her room. “I won’t give up on you, y/n. I’ll show you that what we had is still worth fighting for.”

As Harry finished and exited her room, y/n sighed and slumped back on her bed staring at the ceiling. Not even realizing the single tear that fell from her eye. She closed her eyes and muttered, “I don’t want you to give up.”

And maybe y/n slept a little better that night since she released all those pent up emotions inside of her.

—

FUCKKKKKKKKKK.
trail.content:
Moved on?

So, I’ll just try this out. This is my first one shot, EVER. If it worked out fine then great. & I’ll write some more.

Y/N is the host for their Movie Marathon and some things needed to be addressed and let out.

  • 2k words
  • ANGST!
  • I want to cry.

And this time, y/n will turn her apartment into a movie theater that’ll cater up to 8 people. Well, 9. Harry’s fling wanted to join the movie marathon, and y/n is infuriated.

Why couldn’t he message y/n before hand that he will bring someone in their movie marathon? What is his point? Just because they broke up two weeks ago, he wanted to make y/n jealous?

The clock striked 6pm. One by one of their friends would arrive and y/n would answer the door.

“Oh! Come on in. There are wine and cheese platter in the kitchen. There are beers inside the fridge and snacks in the cupboard. Just help yourself.” y/n called out to their friends as she answered the door.

Before she could face the person who she opened the door for, she was enveloped into a hug and the familiar scent made her head dizzy. “Hello. I missed you.” Harry said to her. Y/n hummed and untangled herself from the hug.

Harry was smiling. Like really smiling. His dimples were out and about. Standing beside him was a beautiful and petite girl. And y/n didn’t realize that she was staring at her and their entwined hands. When Harry saw on what she was staring, he cleared his throat and that made y/n come back to her senses, “Fuck. I’m so rude for staring. I’m y/n, Harry’s e- I mean, friend.” She said smiling at her and brought her hand forward awaiting Harry’s companion to introduce herself, “That’s okay. I’m Nadine.” The girl replied and shook her hand.

She smiled and stepped to the side to let them in.

All smile and eyes twinkling was the thing that you can see on y/n, but inside, she was screaming her head off and breaking into pieces.

When everyone was complete and is already situated in her living room, y/n took the popcorn and mozzarella sticks to the living room to get the movie marathon started.

“Kent? Will you do the honors to present me the genre bowl for tonight? So we would know what genre of movie that we’re going to watch.” Their friend Kent stood up and took the glass bowl filled with folded papers that contained movie genres of all sorts and stood beside y/n. “Here. Take one.” Y/n took a piece of paper and unfolded it. As she was unfolding it, she saw Harry and Nadine all cuddled up on the sofa and not paying attention to what’s happening in front of them.

“Oh, fuck. Great! It’s Horror. Can I choose something else?” Y/n sighed. She’s not a fan of horror movies at ALL. One time, when they had chosen Horror as the genre of film that they’ll be watching in their friend Leah’s apartment, y/n forced everyone to sleep in one bedroom with all the lights on. She was THAT terrified.

That’s why she was unsure of this genre that she had picked. “Nope! We’ve been watching Comedy and Romance way too long. Like four movie marathons in a row. Horror is a breathe of fresh air.” Kent said as y/n’s shoulder slumped with his statement. “Let’s just get on with it, I guess.” Y/n replied, still sad and truly horrified on what’s about to happen in tonight’s movie marathon.

Y/n went to her iPad and connected to the Apple TV so that they can watch it on Netflix. Y/n didn’t know this kind of stuff. Harry gave the Apple TV as a present, and she hadn’t used it only if needed to.

Leah saw that she was struggling connecting the iPad to the Apple TV, so she threw a pillow in Harry’s direction. Which he was still flirting with Nadine. “Oi, mate! Help y/n with the setup and stop sucking each other’s faces. Jeez!” Harry rolled his eyes at Leah and mocked her. He untangled himself from Nadine and kissed her temple as he stood up to help y/n.

Y/n handed her iPad to Harry, and he took it. Within 2 minutes, the iPad was already connected, and Harry gave it back to y/n.

Y/n thanked Harry, and he smiled back at her. Y/n turned around from them and made a gagging gesture.

Y/n picked “The Nun” and sat down beside the two love birds. She just rolled her eyes and munch on the popcorn as she was intently watching the movie and trying not to flinch or scream that much because there is no one there to hold her. She felt a tap on her shoulder, and that made her scream out loud and made a mess from her popcorn bowl.

“Oh my god! I’m so sorry, Y/N. I just wanted to ask you if are there any more beers in the fridge? Nadine wanted some.” Harry said hurriedly. Y/n was clutching her chest at the moment and heaving out loud. “You fucker! You could’ve called me and not tap my shoulder. And to answer your question, no. There aren’t any more beers in the fridge. I only bought eight cans.” Y/N hit Harry’s arm and diverted her gaze back to the movie.

Harry snickered and slumped back to the couch, “Here, baby. Just drink mine. I’ll just go get some water for us.” He said while holding his beer out to Nadine. He stood up and shrugged out the popcorn kernels from his jeans and went to the kitchen.

Y/n just rolled her eyes again. “Who the fuck does he think he is? Making me jealous and calling her fling ‘baby’? All he ever called ‘baby’ was me! Okay, I know we broke up, but that was his type of endearment to me!” Having a monologue inside her brain. Y/N had a frown etched on her face while watching the movie. Not that interested and scared anymore with the movie ever since Harry called Nadine “baby.”

Harry came back with two bottles of water in hand and gave the other one to Nadine. “Thanks, bub.” Nadine cooed at Harry and kissed his cheeks. And y/n still had a frown on her face.

As the movie progresses, y/n was already bored of it and not interested in it. Since she knew that Taissa Farmiga was in the movie because apparently, Taissa was too pretty and cute for Y/N that’s why she wasn’t terrified anymore.

She was playing a game on her phone when she felt someone kicking her sides. When she glanced beside her, Nadine was already laying down the sofa, and her head was on Harry’s lap.

Y/n groaned and brushed off Nadine’s leg which caught their attention. Y/n just looked at them and raised her eyebrows. Gesturing at Nadine’s feet nudging her. Nadine smiled and said a soft “sorry” to her. Y/n nodded and returned playing on her phone.

After a few minutes while she was already in Level 168 of Happy Glass when she lost grip on her phone due to someone’s foot colliding with her phone screen.

She stood up and paused the movie. Earning a few groans from their friends. She flicked on the light switch of her living room only to see Harry and Nadine full on snogging.

Y/n’s eyes went wide with what she saw and heard a few gasps behind her. She saw Nadine’s water bottle on the table, she opened it and threw the contents of the bottle to them.

“WHAT THE FUCK!” Harry yelled, abruptly standing up which resulted to Nadine falling off the couch. “OW! HARRY!” Nadine moaned while clutching her arm. “Oh, fuck! I’m so sorry, baby.” Harry immediately rushed to her side and helped her sat down the sofa.

And that statement, made y/n lose her mind. “BABY? Are you fucking kidding me?” Y/n yelled at the top of her lungs. Making everyone go silent. Only y/n’s breathing will be heard. Harry and Nadine looked small in y/n’s gaze. Only if looks could kill, they’d be dead for sure.

Leah ran to y/n’s side and rubbed her back and whispered, “Calm down, y/n. You’re better than this. Don’t do it.” That made y/n tear up. A tear after another and another fell down y/n’s cheeks.

“First, I didn’t complained to you when you said you were going to have a plus one in this movie marathon and you didn’t informed me in advance. Second, you weren’t paying attention to the movie and to me while I was infront. And thirdly, I am deeply hurt. You’re already moved on even tho we’ve only broken up 2 weeks ago.” After that outburst, y/n ran to her room and locked herself there.

Knock and screams is the only thing that is consuming the apartment. Apart from blaming Harry to all of this. She can hear their friends going to the other room to sleep or to just talk to each other of what just happened to y/n.

Y/n was laying on her bed facing the wall and she heard a click on her door knob and a silhouette came in view from her wall. “Go away. I don’t fucking need you here. Who ever you are. Go away.” Y/n warned while sniffling.

“I only brought Nadine just so I can get a reaction from you.” Harry said. That voice. That voice that made y/n’s heart shatter, happy and all sorts of emotions.

Y/n remained still in her position. “Well, that’s a shitty move. Also, I don’t know what I would feel if I was a bait of my fling just to get back to her ex.” Harry chuckled with that and y/n just rolled her eyes.

Y/n has a habit to roll her eyes. Like every situation ever. “I can sense that you’re rolling your eyes at me. Also, who says about getting back together?” Y/n’s eyes widened at that. In fact, no one really said about getting back together. All he said was to get a reaction from her.

Y/n hoped that Harry can’t see her cheeks in a deep shade of red because of embarrassment. Good thing that the room is dark enough.

She sat up and faced him. She sniffed her nose and coughed up. Harry slowly made his way to her bed and sat down, “I’m sorry, y/n. That was so immature of me. I still love you. I never stopped loving you, y/n.”

She really didn’t know what to say with that. She fiddled with her fingers and heaved up. “I don’t know what to say, Harry. I’ve been so emotionally unstable ever since my Aunt died last month and especially last 2 weeks ago when we broke up. I still love you too. But I don’t know if I want us to be together again. I think we’re better off as friends.” As y/n finished her statement, Harry was already at her door and about to exit her room. “I won’t give up on you, y/n. I’ll show you that what we had is still worth fighting for.”

As Harry finished and exited her room, y/n sighed and slumped back on her bed staring at the ceiling. Not even realizing the single tear that fell from her eye. She closed her eyes and muttered, “I don’t want you to give up.”

And maybe y/n slept a little better that night since she released all those pent up emotions inside of her.

—

blog.name: toomuchlarry
blog.title: larry ofc
blog.description: my recommendation of my fav fics i’ve read. also send me your fav fics or even yours so i can read them and put them on here!!

summary: come on jump out at me
body:
come on jump out at me

by yoursongonmyheart

summary

“you know, i offered for you to fake out me, but, i don’t know anything about you other than you being my biggest celebrity crush probably since posh spice.”


louis almost chokes on his chicken, “jesus christ,” he sputters.


harry takes a swig of his beer with a smirk. “i was very disappointed when you didn’t say i was your celebrity crush after you came out.”


louis almost cries. “you know i did plan on it. then i ran into you narrating taking a piss and talking about my ass and i thought ‘wow this kid does talk some shit’ and decided against it.”


harry barks out a laugh, his ears tinged red. he takes a bite of his pizza. “i suppose i do have no filter while high.”


louis rolls his eyes, “bit of an understatement, mate.”


harry giggles, “whatever pal,” louis screams internally.


—-


Or, the one where actor louis tomlinson and one direction superstar harry styles try to fake a sex tape to help harry get out of the closet and they both get more than they bargained for.


EDIT: this has two chapters, one capitalized, one uncapitalized.

title: imagine!
body: your boyfriend Charles Heaton is a famous actor on the show stranger thing. u are sick and have to have a stranger thing transplant to survive. at the last moment, someone donates one. when you get out of the transplant you see the stranger thing and Charles. but something seems different. “who do u think donated the stranger thing?” he says. lacking the stranger thing, he reverts back to Harry Styles.

summary: Guys ObVIOslY Harry must have met someone days after "breaking up" with Camille that he thought was so amazing and would spend...
body:
Guys ObVIOslY Harry must have met someone days after “breaking up” with Camille that he thought was so amazing and would spend the rest of his life with and after only a few days got a tattoo of an L on his pinky to show his love and affection towards this person despite only just meeting them, six months later they’ve already decided that they should be together for eternity and become engaged (or married) as Harry’s ring finger that is usually left vacant from his many rings now has a ring surrounding it…. Just 6 months later, they must be crazy in love despite Harry never letting the media find out unlike his multiple past relationships.

(What a perfect love story)

BUT IT’S LOUIS YOU FOOL.

It’s always been and always will be Louis that Harry is deeply in love with and no matter how much the will try to be forced apart they are still together still going strong because to each other they are home.

(What a perfect love story)

BUT IT’S LOUIS YOU FOOL.

It’s always been and always will be Louis that Harry is deeply in love with and no matter how much the will try to be forced apart they are still together still going strong because to each other they are home.

trail.content_raw:
Guys ObVIOslY Harry must have met someone days after “breaking up” with Camille that he thought was so amazing and would spend the rest of his life with and after only a few days got a tattoo of an L on his pinky to show his love and affection towards this person despite only just meeting them, six months later they’ve already decided that they should be together for eternity and become engaged (or married) as Harry’s ring finger that is usually left vacant from his many rings now has a ring surrounding it…. Just 6 months later, they must be crazy in love despite Harry never letting the media find out unlike his multiple past relationships.

(What a perfect love story)

BUT IT’S LOUIS YOU FOOL.

It’s always been and always will be Louis that Harry is deeply in love with and no matter how much the will try to be forced apart they are still together still going strong because to each other they are home.

Just 6 months later, they must be crazy in love despite Harry never letting the media find out unlike his multiple past relationships.

It’s always been and always will be Louis that Harry is deeply in love with and no matter how much the will try to be forced apart they are still together still going strong because to each other they are home.

blog.name: pendantstyles
blog.title: you bring me home
blog.description:
hannah | vision isn’t 20/20, but harry is!!

+ requests are always open! +

masterlist

summary: Harry wakes up on Christmas with a sleepy smile, his face half smushed against the pillow as he looks at you.  "Morning, baby." ...
question: Harry wakes up on Christmas with a sleepy smile, his face half smushed against the pillow as he looks at you.  "Morning, baby."  "Morning, lovely," his deep morning voice makes your body shiver pleasantly.  He reaches an arm around your waist and traces small lines up and down your thigh or the small of your back.  "Merry Christmas," you kiss his forehead.  "Merry Christmas," He's brushing locks of hair from his face and smiling shyly, excitement clear in his face. "Can we go open presents now?"
answer: HE’D BE SO EXCITED AND HE EVEN OFFERS THAT HE COULD OPEN YOUR GIFTS FOR YOU

reblog.comment: HE’D BE SO EXCITED AND HE EVEN OFFERS THAT HE COULD OPEN YOUR GIFTS FOR YOU

summary: Harry having eaten too much at Christmas dinner and consequently feeling a bit ill.:(

summary: Harry wanting to go to bed but knows his girl was depressed realizing Christmas is over and also her stomach is upset from...
question: Harry wanting to go to bed but knows his girl was depressed realizing Christmas is over and also her stomach is upset from eating ice cream she can't tolerate so he stays up cuddling her and rubbing her tummy. Care to add?
answer: cuddles her and makes sure she’s not feeling anymore sick before they sleep so he’s sure but he still looks out for his love in between intervals just to make sure!!!
